name: Jolly Lodger
description: Wherever your travels may take you, you'll always find a confortable host off the interstate at the Jolly Lodger! Air conditioning, cable television and the freshest assortment of baked goods delivered fresh to your room each morning! So grab a roll of quarters and enjoy a relaxing Magic Fingers massage as you head into the mid-century with this nifty typeface! Designed by Stuart Sandler of Font Diner, Inc. To contribute to the project contact the Font Diner .
author: Font Diner
